name: Micro Deliveries
description:
Micro Deliveries - You are a delivery man who must deliver micro asteroids filled with life so that life proliferates on these planets (Panspermia), you will face many dangers such as solar flares, tennis vortices or the evil Eggtopus. We hope you enjoy the game!

game by: AkrosRB.itch.io,cerociento.itch.io,Sunzoned.itch.io
